mapper.select: SELECT d.devicename AS deviceName, h.attribute_key AS attributeKey, c.compare_op AS compareOp, c.threshold_value AS thresholdValue, c.threshold_low AS thresholdLow, c.threshold_high AS thresholdHigh, h.trigger_time AS triggerTime FROM alarm_event h LEFT JOIN device d ON h.device_id = d.id LEFT JOIN alarm_condition c ON h.alarm_id = c.alarm_id AND h.attribute_key = c.attribute_key WHERE h.alarm_id = #{alarmId} ORDER BY h.trigger_time DESC

SELECT r.id AS ruleId, r.name AS alarmName, r.alert_level AS alertLevel,
d.devicename AS deviceName,
c.attribute_key AS attributeKey, c.compare_op AS compareOp, c.threshold_value AS thresholdValue, c.threshold_low AS thresholdLow, c.threshold_high AS thresholdHigh,
h.trigger_time AS triggerTime FROM alarm_rule r INNER JOIN alarm_event h ON h.alarm_id = r.id INNER JOIN alarm_condition c ON c.alarm_id = h.alarm_id AND c.attribute_key = h.attribute_key INNER JOIN device d ON d.id = h.device_id WHERE r.project_id = #{projectId} ORDER BY h.trigger_time DESC
